attributes.action: bring our boys home from the war zones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a mother of a soldier I think it is time for them all to come home and let these countries go it alone. Most of the time our soldiers cant even see who they are fighting and if you are not going to bring them home you can at least make sure they have the right equipment to fight a war with.
